text: White Men Can't Jump is a 1992 American comedy-drama sports movie in which Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson star. The earlier stars as Sidney Deane, and the latter acts as Billy Hoyle, between whom a partnership forms. In this comedy-drama, the subject is basketball around Los Angeles. Rosie Perez acts as Billy's girlfriend Gloria. == Other websites == * Category:1992 comedy- drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American sports movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Sports comedy movies Category:Sports drama movies
title: White Men Can't Jump
